about.title: About Me
text: I am a Web Developer with a degree in Information Systems from the Federal University of Pará. In my daily work, I mainly use React, JavaScript, and TypeScript to build modern and dynamic interfaces. On the server side, I work with Node.js and frameworks such as NestJS and Express, which help me structure solid and well-organized systems. To handle databases, I have experience with PostgreSQL and MySQL, and in my development workflow I use Git and Vite to keep everything agile and well organized. The technologies above represent what is most present in my work today. Even so, I am always studying and exploring new tools to continue evolving as a professional.

Since I wrote my first lines of code, I discovered that technology, for me, is a way to transform ideas into real experiences. I enjoy creating simple, functional, and well-structured interfaces, always thinking about the best way for each person to interact with what’s on the screen. I work with a focus on building fast, responsive, and easy-to-use applications, whether for personal or professional projects.
